name: Summon: Hive
shortDescription: Summon a Hive relic with <ability value=2017>Hive</ability> to target adjacent space.

name: Spell Charged
shortDescription: When a spell is played, this unit gains 2 charges.

name: Haunting Visions
shortDescription: At the beginning of its turn, this champion gains 2 AP and +3 DMG and +1 DEF for 2 turns if your opponent has 35 or less nora. This does not stack.

name: Instigate
shortDescription: Friendly champions within 5 spaces that share a race or class with this one gain <ability value=259>Enrage 1</ability>. This does not stack.

name: Relic Overload
shortDescription: All relics take 10 Electricity damage.

name: Widowmaker
shortDescription: This unit makes an attack for 0 AP against any adjacent opposing champion with 30% or less of its HP remaining.

name: Reckless
shortDescription: When this champion spends 5 or more AP on attacks and abilities in a single turn, it loses 5 HP.

name: Drop Beacon
shortDescription: A Skywing Beacon with Beacon (Starting on your next turn, spaces adjacent to this relic are deployment zones for the controller of this relic) is deployed in target adjacent square.  This ability is removed after use.

name: Fire Turret
shortDescription: This unit makes a Fire attack at RNG 2-7.

name: Distichous: ST/SL
shortDescription: When an ST champion is deployed from the runedock, this champion gains <ability value=1744>Frost Acolyte</ability> and <ability value=135>Frost Aura 1</ability> for 4 turns.  When an SL champion is deployed from the runedock, this champion gains <ability value=1908>Fire Acolyte</ability> and <ability value=131>Fire Aura 1</ability> for 4 turns.

name: Skeletal Rider
shortDescription: When this unit is destroyed, no nora globe is dropped and a Decayed Mercenary with no upgrades is spawned in the location this unit occupied.

name: Spellsurge: Murkwater Weakness
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed, Murkwater Weakness spells are revealed from your runedock.  Murkwater Weakness spells costs 10 nora less (this does not stack) and this champion is healed for 8 HP when a Murkwater Weakness spell is played.

name: Snogvie's Greeting
shortDescription: When this champion comes into play, all enemy champions take 5 sonic damage and become <condition value=distracted>Distracted</condition> for 2 turns. This damage ignores defense.

name: Frostvine Snare
shortDescription: At the end of its turn, enemy champions within 2 spaces take 4 Frost damage and are <condition value=ensnared>Ensnared</condition> for 2 turns.

name: Surge: Dragon
shortDescription: This unit has +1 DMG for each friendly Dragon.

name: Beckoning Guile
shortDescription: Target a space within 5 spaces. Enemy champions without <ability value=4>Iron Will</ability> within 5 spaces of the target move one space towards it.

name: Summon: Boghopper Tad
shortDescription: Summon a Boghopper Tad with no upgrades to a target adjacent space.

name: Desecrated Zone
shortDescription: Area Effect 2: Affected spaces are <mechanic value=dead_magic_zone>Dead Magic Zone</mechanic>.

name: Valdaci Sacrifice: Crossbow
shortDescription: This champion loses 5 HP and a Valdaci Crossbow relic with 15 HP and <ability value=2602>Misfire</ability> is summoned to target adjacent unoccupied tile.

name: Snowball
shortDescription: This unit makes a Frost attack at range 2-4 for 8 DMG. This damage ignores DEF.

name: Immunity: Sonic
shortDescription: Sonic damage that would be dealt to this unit is prevented.

name: Ally: Forglar Swamp
shortDescription: While there are other friendly Forglar Swamp champions in play, this champion gets +7 HP and +2 DMG. Forglar champions gain 1 AP when this unit comes into play.

name: Relic Drop: Spore
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed from the runedock, it spends the first 4 turns as a Mushroom relic with 1 DEF and 20 HP.  When this unit is destroyed, it becomes the same mushroom relic without this ability.

name: Seal of the Vashal
shortDescription: Target friendly Vashal or Beast within 5 spaces is <condition value=norashielded>Nora Shielded</condition> and heals for 3 for each unit with Seal of the Vashal (to a maximum of 12).  This ability is removed after use.

name: Equip: Seed of Potential
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed, it is equipped with a Seed of Potential.

name: Swamp Teachings
shortDescription: This unit loses 10 HP and target Boghopper Tad within 3 spaces is removed from play and a Boghopper Pupil with no upgrades is summoned in the same location the Boghopper Tad occupied.

name: Divine Wellspring
shortDescription: While this champion has at least 5 charges, friendly champions within 8 spaces cannot fall below 1 HP via <ability value=1389>Perseverance</ability>.  When this effect prevents the champion's HP from falling below 1, that champion gains <condition value=impervious>Impervious</condition>, <ability value=1237>Impenetrable</ability>, and <ability value=738>Shielded</ability> until the end of that turn and this champion loses all charges.

name: Psychic Agony
shortDescription: The first time this champion falls below 50% HP, enemy champions take 5 Psychic damage. If the champion is <condition value=soultapped>Soultapped</condition>, it becomes <condition value=ensnared>Ensnared</condition> and <condition value=confused>Confused</condition> for 2 turns.

name: Meld: Stitched Merged
shortDescription: The Stitched Hexer, Blackguard and Dreameater combine into a Stitched Merged with full HP. To use this ability, you must have each of those units together in a formation that makes up the base of a large unit, with one empty space.

name: Voil Caverns
shortDescription: The first time each turn a real enemy champion within 5 spaces is destroyed, a Young Bat with no upgrades is summoned adjacent to this unit.

name: Spike Nova
shortDescription: This unit deals 6 Physical damage to each unit within 2 spaces. This damage ignores DEF. Champions successfully damaged become <condition value=burred>Burred</condition> for 4 turns.

name: Spike Nova
shortDescription: This unit deals 3 Physical damage to each unit within 2 spaces. This damage ignores DEF. Champions successfully damaged become <condition value=burred>Burred</condition> for 4 turns.

name: Magical Aura
shortDescription: At the beginning of your opponent's turns, this unit deals 2 Magical damage to each champion within 2 spaces. This damage ignores DEF.

name: Reconstruct: Mangler
shortDescription: Target Stitched Remains relic within 3 spaces is destroyed and a Stitched Mangler is spawned in the location the relic occupied. This ability shares a CD with other Reconstruct abilities.

name: Stormseeker
shortDescription: This champion is relocated adjacent to target champion within 5 spaces with <condition value=shocked>Shocked</condition>, <condition value=paralyzed>Paralyzed</condition> or <condition value=distracted>Distracted</condition> and gains +2 SPD for 3 turns.

name: Surge: Concealed
shortDescription: This unit has +1 DMG for every 2 runes you have concealed.

name: Occlude
shortDescription: This unit loses 3 HP and 3 random runes in your runedock are concealed.

name: Stitched Symbiosis
shortDescription: This champion comes into play with 2 Stitchling Riders.  At the beginning of your turn, this unit heals 3 HP as long as it has at least 1 Stitched Rider on it.  When this champion is successfully attacked by a basic attack, it loses a stack of Stitchling Riders and a Symbiotic Stitchling with no upgrades is summoned adjacent to the attacking champion.

name: Stitched Reconstitution
shortDescription: Destroy target Stitched Remains within 3 spaces. This champion gains 3 AP, is healed for 8 HP and gains a Stitchling Rider (to a maximum of 4).

name: Meld: Stitched Magearm
shortDescription: The Stitched Mesmer, Magician and Shaman combine into a Stitched Magearm with full HP. To use this ability, you must have each of those units together in a formation that makes up the base of a large unit, with one empty space.

name: Guard Tower
shortDescription: At the start of your turns, enemy champions within 4 spaces take 1 Physical damage and are knocked back 1 space (does not affect Stealthed champions).

name: Sabotage: Poison
shortDescription: The next enemy champion deployed from the runedock while this champion is in play takes 6 Poison damage and gains <ability value=91>Vulnerability: Poison</ability>.

name: Portal Siphon
shortDescription: When this champion is successfully relocated, enemy champions within 2 spaces lose 2 HP and this champion vampiric heals for an equal amount.

name: Channel: Defense
shortDescription: This champion has +1 DEF for 2 turns and <ability value=655>Skirmisher</ability> for 2 turns. This ability initially costs 4 nora to activate, with the cost increasing by 1 nora per activation for 1 turn.

name: Swarm: Tundra Beast
shortDescription: When this champion destroys a champion on a basic attack, a Tundra Beast champion with no upgrades is summoned under your control in the location the destroyed champion occupied.

name: Summon: Boghopper Zombie
shortDescription: Summon a Boghopper Zombie with <ability value=517>Leap 2</ability> and <ability value=47>Resistance: Physical 2</ability> to target, within 4 spaces. Spooky!

name: Fury of a Thousand Strikes
shortDescription: The first time each turn this champion makes a successful basic attack, other friendly champions within 5 spaces that share a race or class with this champion have their CDs reduced by 1 and their attack chains reset.

name: Poisonburst
shortDescription: This champion makes an attack at RNG 1-3 for 10 Poison damage.  If successfully damaged, the target is knockbacked 3 spaces, then the target and enemy champions within 2 spaces of the final destination become <condition value=poisoned>Poisoned</condition> for 3 turns.

name: Swift Current
shortDescription: When this champion makes a successful basic attack, friendly champions within 5 spaces gains Mobility for 1 turn and moves 1 space towards the target if able. If the affected champion shares a race or class with this one, it also gains 1 AP.

name: Resistance: Fire
shortDescription: When this unit takes Fire damage, that damage is reduced by 20% (after DEF, rounded up).

name: Transport
shortDescription: Target adjacent friendly normal-sized Tortun is removed from play.

name: Relic Drop: Tomb
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed from the runedock, it spends the first 4 turns as a Tomb relic with 1 DEF and 20 HP.  When this unit is destroyed, it becomes the same Tomb relic.

name: Harvest
shortDescription: Friendly Plant champions lose 1 AP and 2 HP each. You gain 3 nora for each Plant effected.

name: Cursed Treasure
shortDescription: When a nora globe within 8 spaces is recovered, opposing champions within 2 spaces of the nora globe becomes <condition value=cursed>Cursed</condition> for 5 turns.  If the champion was already Cursed, it also takes 5 Disease damage.

name: Ensnare
shortDescription: This champion makes an attack against target opposing champion. If successful, the target becomes Ensnared 2 (each movement costs an additional 2 AP) and takes 50% damage.

name: Combo Attack: Slam
shortDescription: When this champion makes two successful basic attacks against the same champion in a single turn, that champion is knocked back 2 spaces.

name: Unload
shortDescription: Champions removed from play with <ability value=2351>Transport</ability> are returned to play adjacent to this champion.  Champions returned this way keep the HP they had but all effects and equipment on those champions are removed.

name: Swarm: Snowcat
shortDescription: When this champion destroys a champion on a basic attack, a Snowcat champion with no upgrades is summoned under your control in the location the destroyed champion occupied.

name: Skeezick Rapture
shortDescription: Friendly Skeezick within 6 spaces have <ability value=539>Attack: Acid</ability> and <ability value=2491>Scour rank 1</ability>.

name: Summon: Tortalleon
shortDescription: Spend 8 Charges.  This unit becomes <condition value=immobile>Immobile</condition> for 2 turns.  At the beginning of its next turn, a Tortalleon Pygmy without upgrades is summoned to an adjacent space.

name: Pistol Shot
shortDescription: This unit makes a Physical attack at range 2-5.

name: Cannon Barrage
shortDescription: Spend 4 charges. Area Effect 2, Range 5: For each friendly real Tortun (up to 5), a random space is targeted by an AE1 Cannon Ball effect.  Units affected by the Cannon Ball effect take 10 Physical damage (this damage ignores DEF).

name: Quest: Crusade
shortDescription: The first time this champion moves within 3 spaces of an enemy avatar, shrine or font, it is healed for 25 HP and permanently gains +1 DEF, +2 DMG and <ability value=2276>Inquisition</ability>.

name: Frost Turret
shortDescription: This unit makes a Frost attack at RNG 2-7.

name: Resistance: Psychic
shortDescription: When this unit takes Psychic damage, that damage is reduced by 50% (after DEF, rounded up).

name: Warm and Fuzzy
shortDescription: This unit is warm and fuzzy.

name: Tunnel Trap
shortDescription: This unit becomes <condition value=stealthed>Stealthed</condition> and moves directly to target space within 5 spaces.

name: Combo Attack: Drain
shortDescription: When this champion makes two successful basic attacks against the same champion in a single turn, this unit heals an amount equal to the damage done on the second attack.

name: Insubstantiate
shortDescription: At the end of your turn, all <condition value=incorporeal>Incorporeal</condition> champions become <condition value=stealthed>Stealthed</condition>.

name: Truthseeker
shortDescription: This champion is relocated adjacent to target champion within 5 spaces with <condition value=branded>Branded</condition> or <ability value=2004>Faithless</ability> and gains +2 SPD for 3 turns.

name: Three Wishes
shortDescription: Target champion within 3 spaces gains both of this units selected upgrade abilities. This ability is removed after 3 uses.

name: Valdaci Sacrifice: Emerald
shortDescription: This champion loses 5 HP and a Valdaci Emerald relic with 15 HP and <ability value=153>Acidic Aura 3</ability> is summoned to target adjacent unoccupied tile.

name: Valdaci Sacrifice: Burr
shortDescription: This champion loses 5 HP and target enemy champion within 5 spaces is equipped with Valdaci Burr (Equipped champion is <condition value=Burred>Burred</condition>).

name: Resistance: Psychic
shortDescription: When this unit takes Psychic damage, that damage is reduced by 35% (after DEF, rounded up).

name: Resistance: Psychic
shortDescription: When this unit takes Psychic damage, that damage is reduced by 20% (after DEF, rounded up).

name: Summon: Path of De'lim
shortDescription: Summon a Path of De'lim relic with <ability value=3115>Path of De'lim</ability> to target adjacent space.

name: Mirror Swap
shortDescription: This champion is relocated in place of the closest friendly illusion of itself within 5 spaces.

name: Invoke: Intercedence
shortDescription: Area Effect 5: Friendly champions (including this one) are Cleansed and gain 2 stacks of Wind Shield for 4 turns. This effect is automatically triggered with cooldown the first time this champion falls below 50% MAX HP (this triggers even if the ability is already on cooldown and will place the ability on full cooldown).

name: Void Howl
shortDescription: When this champion dies, it deals 12 Sonic Damage to all champions within 3 spaces. This damage ignores DEF. If an opposing non-Illusion, non-Summoned champion is destroyed by this ability, a Voidhowler is spawned under your control.

name: Blessing of the Fallen
shortDescription: When this unit is destroyed, friendly champions gain +1 DEF for 4 turns (this does not stack) and heal 10 HP.

name: Incite Rage
shortDescription: Target friendly Barbarian within 5 spaces gains <ability value=2253>Manic</ability> for 1 turn.

name: Void Strike
shortDescription: This champion's next basic attack this turn has +1 DMG for every 15 nora in your nora bank and deals <mechanic value=lossoflife>Loss of Life</mechanic> instead.

name: Surge: Voil
shortDescription: This unit has +1 DMG for every friendly Voil

name: Valdaci Sacrifice: Tracker
shortDescription: This champion loses 5 HP and the closest friendly equippable champion within 5 spaces is equipped with Valdaci Tracker (Equipped champion has <ability value=13>Detection 3</ability> and <ability value=2671>Illuminate</ability>).

name: Taunt: Vallassa
shortDescription: Taunt your enemies.

name: Damage Shield: Sonic
shortDescription: When this unit is attacked, if the attack is a close-combat attack, the attacking unit takes 2 Sonic damage. This damage ignores DEF.

name: Summon: Young Bat
shortDescription: A Young Bat with no upgrades is summoned on to target adjacent space.

name: Boost: Plant
shortDescription: Friendly champions with Race: Plant gain +5 MAX HP. This does not stack  with other Boosts.

name: Pet: Wolf
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed, a Wolf with no upgrades is summoned adjacent to it.

name: Brand
shortDescription: Target champion within 5 spaces becomes <condition value=branded>Branded</condition> for 4 turns.

name: Invoke: Vothsair Crush
shortDescription: Area Effect 5: Enemy champions take 8 Physical damage and are <condition value=shrunken>Shrunken</condition> for 3 turns. This effect is automatically triggered with cooldown the first time this champion falls below 50% MAX HP (this triggers even if the ability is already on cooldown and will place the ability on full cooldown).

name: Soul Mason
shortDescription: When this unit destroys a champion, your shrine heals HP equal to 20% of the destroyed champion's nora cost.

name: Stunning Wail
shortDescription: Spend 8 Charges. Opposing champions within 6 spaces become <condition value=stunned>Stunned</condition> for 2 turns and this champion loses all remaining charges.

name: Black Tempest
shortDescription: At the beginning of each of this unit's turns, a random opposing champion within 8 spaces takes 6 Electricity damage (this damage ignores DEF).  For every 5 champions in play, this ability triggers again but can only affect a unit once per turn.

name: Summon: Snow Trap
shortDescription: Summon a Snow Trap relic with <ability value=600>Arctic</ability>, <ability value=601>Shadowspawn</ability> and <ability value=1025>Arctic Trap</ability> to target adjacent space.

name: Relocate: Arthropod
shortDescription: Target friendly Arthropod within 5 spaces is relocated to a space adjacent to this unit.

name: Whirling Stones
shortDescription: At the end of this unit's turns and when it is the target of a basic attack, the closest enemy champion within 3 spaces takes 5 Physical damage and is knocked back 2 spaces.

name: Damage Shield: Sonic
shortDescription: When this unit is attacked, if the attack is a close-combat attack, the attacking unit takes 4 Sonic damage. This damage ignores DEF.

name: Damage Shield: Sonic
shortDescription: When this unit is attacked, if the attack is a close-combat attack, the attacking unit takes 6 Sonic damage. This damage ignores DEF.

name: Rebuke
shortDescription: Whenever an opposing champion within 5 spaces gains AP through spells and abilities, it takes 1 electricity damage per AP gained.

name: Wolf Pack
shortDescription: When this champion is deployed from the runedock, 2 Timber Wolves champions with no upgrades are summoned adjacent to it.

name: Commander: Flying
shortDescription: Friendly champions within 5 spaces with Flying have +2 DMG. This ability does not stack with other Commanders.

name: Bind: Spells
shortDescription: When this champion destroys an enemy champion, enemy spells cost 5 nora more to play while this champion is in play. This ability triggers up to 3 times.

name: Vanguard
shortDescription: When this champion is within 5 spaces of a friendly champion with <ability value=685>Arrow Eater</ability> or <ability value=2469>Elusive</ability>, this unit gains <ability value=116>Regeneration 2</ability> and +1 SPD.

name: Wicked Aura
shortDescription: Whenever an enemy champion within 3 spaces would gain AP, they get 1 less than normal.

name: Coercive Pact
shortDescription: Target champion within 5 spaces loses 50% of its current HP. This unit loses HP by the same amount.

name: Elemental Storm: Frost
shortDescription: Enemy champions within 3 spaces of at least one friendly Elemental, Shaman or Wizard, including this one, take 5 Frost damage (ignores DEF) and lose up to 1 AP. This champion gains 1 AP per AP lost this way.

name: Surge: Tundra
shortDescription: This unit has +1 DMG for every 2 champions occupying Ice or Snow.

name: Guarded: Yeti
shortDescription: The first time each turn this unit is successfully attacked by a basic attack, friendly Yeti within 5 spaces gain 2 AP and +4 DMG for 2 turns.

name: Leverage: Yeti
shortDescription: When this unit is deployed from the runedock, the next Yeti you deploy from the runedock cost 10 less nora for 3 turns. This effect does not stack.

name: Chuck: Wood
shortDescription: This champion makes a Physical attack RNG 2-5.  A summoned Woodchucked Wood relic (15 HP with <ability value=2082>Jungle Front</ability>) is summoned adjacent to the target if it is successfully damaged.

name: Transplant
shortDescription: When this champion would be destroyed and has at least 10 MAX HP, the nearest friendly plant champion is destroyed and this champion respawns on that location with -10 MAX HP.

name: Aegis
shortDescription: If another friendly Shattered Peaks champion is in play this champion has <ability value=68>Resistance: Poison 3</ability>, <ability value=80>Resistance: Disease 3</ability> and <ability value=49>Resistance: Physical 3</ability>.  If another friendly Savage Tundra champion is in play this champion has <ability value=84>Resistance: Psychic 3</ability>, <ability value=72>Resistance: Sonic 3</ability>, <ability value=76>Resistance: Acid 3</ability> and <ability value=64>Resistance: Electricity 3</ability>.

name: Chuck: Flaming Skull
shortDescription: This champion makes a Fire attack at RNG 2-5. A summoned Flaming Skull relic with 0 DEF, 15 HP, <ability value=3205>Flaming Skull</ability> is summoned adjacent to the target if it is successfully damaged.

name: Glorious Drain
shortDescription: Target friendly champion you own loses 12 HP. This unit vampiric heals 12 HP.

name: Dark Favor
shortDescription: When this unit is deployed, enemy champions lose 9 HP.

name: Psychic Compulsion
shortDescription: Target enemy champion within 5 spaces becomes Compelled (This champion may only target the closest enemy champion to it with activated abilities, including basic attacks) for 4 turns.

name: Rebuke
shortDescription: Whenever an opposing champion within 6 spaces gains AP through spells and abilities, it takes 2 electricity damage per AP gained.

name: Corpse Restoration
shortDescription: The first time each turn a friendly real champion within 5 spaces is destroyed, a Shambling Zombie without upgrades is summoned adjacent to this unit.
